# Laboratorio 1 - CineVision Studios

```{r}
movies <- read.csv("movies_2026.csv")
movies_cuant <- movies[sapply(movies, is.numeric)]
movies_cual <- movies[sapply(movies, function(x) !is.numeric(x))]
```
